data.name: Notification_Error_SaveFail
data.value: Error during saving. Try to export your char and restart the App.

data.name: Notification_Error_Loader_Error1
data.value: There was an Error during loading you char. More information at the Notifications.

data.name: Notification_Error_Unknown
data.value: A unknown Error occured. You char was saved with a "Emergency" prefix.

data.name: Notification_Error_AuswahlToLess
data.value: Error: Some linked items were not found

data.name: Notification_Error_IO_FolderNotFoundOrNotCreated
data.value: could not find and create folder

data.name: Notification_Info_ConvertFromPrevious
data.value: This file is a old version. It will now be converted to the most recent file version. Because of that, it might not be full readable at old versions of the app.

data.name: Tut_State_01
data.value:
Welcome to ShadowRunHelper!
This tutorial will explain the essential elements of the app.
If the tutorial covers the whole screen (on small displays) you can make it transparent through the eye-button.

data.name: Tut_State_02
data.value: The main navigation. These 3 buttons are always visible. Switch with them between 1. the current character sheet 2. the list of all character sheets 3. settings, imprint, help

data.name: Tut_State_04
data.value: That's it with the tutorial. You can create a new character, but it's better to look at the example character first.

data.name: Tut_State_03
data.value:
In the current view you manage all saved character sheets.
The red highlighted list shows all your saved characters. By default, chars are saved within the app. In the options you can choose whether they should be synchronized via your account. You can also choose a different folder as the location.

data.name: HelpDBIntro
data.value: In this database you will find predefined entries. Click on an entry to select it. With the commands below you can then apply this selection to your current character. If you already have an entry with the same name in the same category, your entry will not be overwritten. For database entries with links to other entries, the system tries to link your entries. If this fails, the linked entry is also copied.

data.name: Help1
data.value: Items (e. g. weapons, CyberDecks, normal items) can be "active". This means that they are taken into automatic calculations. For example, the limit value of an "shooting"-action can be linked to the precision of the active weapon. If the active weapon is changed, the dependent values change automatically.

data.name: Help2
data.value: Some default values are updated automatically. Essence begins at 6, from which all the values of the essence entered in augmentation are deducted. Under "Person" there is an "Essence Mod" field. The value there is added to the calculated value. So if you make out with vampires, you will probably enter a negative value in this field.

data.name: Help3
data.value: For actions and skills, all other things can be linked. In this way, your dice pool can be automatically calculated from other values. If the linked values change, dependent values change automatically. Categories such as weapons, armour, vehicles, comlinks and decks cannot be selected individually, but each property can be selected individually. See "Active Items".

data.name: Help4
data.value: With this app you can manage several ShadowRun Chars. All stored chars are displayed in the list. This list is usually an internal folder, but you can choose any folder. In the options there are different settings for this.

data.name: Help5
data.value: There are two options for saving a char. By default, the file name is used to store the char. If the option "Progress" is selected, the filename will contain the number of runs and karma - so a versioning is possible. In addition, the "Time" option can be used to add the exact time to the filename.

data.name: Notification_Info_NotSupportedVersion
data.value: This Fileversion is outdated. If you want to upgrade this char, please contact support.

data.name: Notification_Error_SaveFail_OPInProgress
data.value: Saving not possible, an other operation is in progress

data.name: Notification_Info_UpgradedChar_1_5_to_1_6
data.value: Your char was upgraded to the newest version. you cannot open it in older app versions properly.

data.name: Error_LoadPurchases
data.value: Error: Could not load your purchases

data.name: Error_CopyFiles
data.value: Fehler: Konnte nicht (alle) Dateien an neuen Ort kopieren.

data.name: Notification_Char_Loaded_File
data.value: A Char was loaded from file

data.name: Notification_NewVersion
data.value: Welcome to the new version: {0}. Check out a list of new features here!

data.name: VersionHistory
data.value: Version 1.9.8 [fix] Input of . or , was not possible Version 1.9.7 [new] Indicator Icons for minimized Header [fix] Template for drones [fix] Windows "open with" Dialog Version 1.9.5Version 1.9.5 [new] New Char have more Contents [new] Category is: Drones Version 1.9.1 [new] BackUp Versioning: The options to append time or progress to a saved char led to too many errors and exceptions. Therefore, they have been removed. Instead, there is now a BackUp versioning that combines both options and makes more sense. new] Redesigned Char Page header. Version 1.8.5 [fix] Aus Datei geladene Chars wurden nicht gespeichert, wenn die Optionen Fortschritt oder Zeit aktiv waren Version 1.8.4: [new] Lifestyle cost button Version 1.8.3: [new] Track your favorites [new] Contextmenu for Things [new] Copy, Cut, Paste Things (Contextmenu) [new] Char name in taskbar Version 1.7.6: [new] Seperators Version 1.7.4: [new] Category options (Sort, Export,...) [new] Technomancer Categories [new] Own categories for calculated values [new] Links are now possible for attributes and battle items [new] Links are now possible with every item [new] Example Character [new] Multi-window option (for Windows April Update) [new] Drag and Drop between different windows (for Windows April Update) [new] TimeLine Integration (for Windows April Update) [new] notifications [new] no more reloading to apply char options [new] added many tooltips for buttons [new] complete English translation [new] Drag and Drop between categories

data.name: Error_LoadCharFolder
data.value: Error reading the char directory. Reset the external folder.

data.name: AppImportErrors
data.value: The import of the following settings or files failed.

data.name: Tip1
data.value: Windows sometimes closes apps due to lack of resources. Try the autosave option if you want to avoid data loss.

data.name: Tip2
data.value: Use a cloud folder as an external storage folder. So your chars are safe

data.name: Tip3
data.value: Categories you don't need can be hidden from the Character Bow menu.

data.name: Tip4
data.value: At the top left of your character sheet is the character sheet menu. Take a look inside.

data.name: Tip5
data.value: Are links sometimes no longer updated? Try "Repair" in the charactersheet-menu.

data.name: Tip10
data.value: The damage menu is located at the top right. I hope you don't have to use it too much.

data.name: Tip11
data.value: If you want to show your character sheet to someone who doesn't have the app, you can export it as csv.

data.name: Tip6
data.value: You can set in the options that chars are saved with the current progress (Karma and Runs). This makes versioning possible.

data.name: Tip7
data.value: Objects that can be set to "Active" are only included in calculations if they are active.

data.name: Tip8
data.value: The default value of the essence is 6, from which essence values from implants are subtracted.

data.name: Tip9
data.value: Damage maxima are displayed at the top of the damage menu.

data.name: Tip12
data.value: Tip gone too fast? Tap on it!

data.name: Tip13
data.value: Use Drag'N'Drop to copy / move objects between categories.

data.name: Tip14
data.value: Since the latest Windows update, you can have the app open several times.

data.name: Tip15
data.value: Use Drag'N'Drop to copy / move objects between apps.

data.name: Notification_Info_UpgradedChar
data.value: Your char was upgraded to the newest version. you cannot open it in older app versions properly.

data.name: Tip16
data.value: The app can be used under several Windows versions, but may not have the full range of functions. Keep your Windows up to date.

data.name: Tip17
data.value: Keep your character sheet backups up to date and you'll be safe from data corruption.

data.name: Tip18
data.value: Do you like the App? Give a rating at the Store!

data.name: Notification_Success_Import
data.value: Char was successfully imported and is now available at the current saveplace
